climbs.name: Windfall Crack
climbs.fa: September 9, 2020--Ben Miller, John Halupowski and John Rice

content.description: A left leaning crack up the prominent face.  A couple face moves, then up the crack utilizing jugs and jams.  Step up onto the pedestal when the crack ends and finish up the Ski Baby face directly above.
content.protection: Standard rack.  Protects well.  The upper face has two bolts.  Double ring anchor at the top.
content.location: It is right there where the climbers path arrives at the crag. A few feet left of the start to The Creature Within.

climbs.name: Theo
climbs.fa: John Halupowski, Ben Miller, and John Rice 7/20/20

content.description: Excellent and interesting climbing. Climb a left facing corner/crack exiting right to the top of a pedestal. Climb left into a beautiful circle feature and up a steep face passing 2 bolts to the 2 bolt/ring anchor.
content.protection: 2 bolts, regular rack with cams up to a Camalot #2or #3. SS rap anchors.
content.location: The third climb on your left upon reaching the crag and just past a striking left trending vertical crack.

climbs.name: Submariners Can't Get Me
climbs.fa: July 20,  2020  Ben Miller, John Ski and John Rice

content.description: Up face moves to a finger crack.  Trending a little left, head up the highly featured face to the upper block where you can reach for a bolt.  Leftward moves up the block top you out.  Rap rings are set back a little.
content.protection: First protection is fifteen feet up the 5.6 face. Good protection after that with a standard rack. A bolt protects the steeper exit moves.
content.location: Left most climb, where the climbers path turns steeply up.  Ascends  the prominent buttress around the corner from where you arrive at the cliff.

climbs.name: The Creature Within
climbs.fa: John Halupowski, Ben Miller, John Rice   7/20/20

content.description: Climb up a steep face passing 3 bolts then right to a ramp and another bolt. Follow the ramp to a right facing corner. At the top of the corner 2 bolts protect the upper face.
content.protection: 6 bolts, med cams/wires. ss rap anchors
content.location: The approach trail leads directly to it. Center of the cliff.

content.description: A nice addition to the neighborhood. This crag has a lot of interesting rock features that make for fun climbing. Climbs are about 80' long.
